thread.title: Nintendo Switch makes Microsoft's lack of a portable Xbox even more painful
thread.title_full: Nintendo Switch makes Microsoft's lack of a portable Xbox even more painful

author: Richard Devine
title: Nintendo Switch makes Microsoft's lack of a portable Xbox even more painful
text:
I've always wanted a portable Xbox console from Microsoft. The Nintendo Switch just reminds me of that fact.
I've always loved handheld gaming.
From the days of the Game Boy Pocket to the present day, when I just got my new Nintendo Switch , I enjoy being able to play games whenever and wherever I am. I'm not only a Nintendo loyalist, either; I have both of Sony's portable efforts, too, and I still play games on one of them.
But I don't have a portable Xbox, and that makes me sad.
